column1: #text=I was tired from a long day of baseball practice and could not wait to take a bath .
#text=I was pretty muddy from sliding into home plate and scoring the winning run .
#text=I went into the bathroom and started running the water in the bathtub .
#text=I put the hot and cold faucets both on to make sure the water was warm but not too hot .
#text=After the tub filled up a little over the halfway point I got into the bath .
#text=I had some bubble bath shampoo with me so I put that into the water and had fun playing with the bubbles .
#text=I washed the soapy water all over my body and felt clean and refreshed .
#text=After about ten minutes I turned the water off and grabbed a nearby towel .
#text=I toweled off and put my dirty clothes in the laundry basket .
#text=I was ready for another nine innings of baseball .
